thread.title: Here's how you can watch the UNLV-Fresno State game
thread.title_full: Here's how you can watch the UNLV-Fresno State game | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: reviewjournal.com
title: Here's how you can watch the UNLV-Fresno State game
text:
The UNLV Rebels face the Fresno State Bulldogs tonight at Bulldog Stadium in Fresno.
UNLV enters the game off a 33-27 overtime loss last week to San Jose State .
If you want to catch the game, here's everything you need to know.
Time: 7:30 p.m. PDT
TV: ESPN2 (DirecTV 209, Cox 31, Dish 143, CenturyLink 28)
Radio: ESPN 1100
RJ Picks: UNLV at Fresno State Win would put UNLV in...
